message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $180. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I am only able to pay up to $150 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While the product is worth significantly more to me, I'm willing to come down to $165 to make this deal happen.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay up to $160 for the product.
